dialog.description: Registrer detaljer om din kommunikation med en modtager
dialog.title: Log kommunikation

empty.subtitle: Klik på 'Log kommunikation' for at registrere din første interaktion
empty.title: Ingen kommunikation logget endnu

placeholders.subject: Kort emne for kommunikationen
placeholders.summary: Detaljeret sammenfatning af hvad der blev diskuteret

default.motivationalElement: Hver beslutning, du tager, beskytter dine kære.
default.nextStepGuidance: At se det store billede vil guide dine næste trin.
default.supportingMessage: Denne indsats styrker din families fundament.

highOverwhelm.actionableAdvice: Overvej at bryde opgaven ned i mindre dele for fokus.
highOverwhelm.motivationalElement: At vide, du drives af kærlighed og omsorg.
highOverwhelm.nextStepGuidance: Hver lille handling, du tager, gør en betydelig forskel.
highOverwhelm.primaryMessage: Din dedikation til din familie er beundringsværdig.
highOverwhelm.supportingMessage: Det er okay at tage et øjeblik til at samle sig.

lowConfidence.actionableAdvice: Fortsæt i dit eget komfortable tempo.
lowConfidence.motivationalElement: Din omhyggelige tilgang er et bevis på dine værdier.
lowConfidence.nextStepGuidance: Når du er klar, fortsæt med det næste vigtige trin for at sikre din families fremtid.
lowConfidence.primaryMessage: Du håndterer denne situation med omsorg og indsigt.
lowConfidence.supportingMessage: Det viser, at du forstår opgavens betydning.

emergencyOnly.fullDescription: Får kun adgang, når nødprotokol aktiveres
emergencyOnly.title: Kun nød

fullAccess.fullDescription: Kan se al information, du har delt med dem
fullAccess.title: Fuld adgang

limitedInfo.fullDescription: Kan se grundlæggende information nu for at hjælpe dem med at forberede sig
limitedInfo.title: Begrænset info

emergencyProtocol.description: Nødprotokol giver betroede personer med "Kun nød" adgang til at anmode om information under kritiske situationer. Kræver bekræftelse fra en anden betroet person.
emergencyProtocol.title: Nødprotokol

memberManagement.addMorePeople: Tilføj flere betroede personer til dit netværk
memberManagement.lastContactOver30Days: Sidste kontakt for over 30 dage siden
memberManagement.title: Administrer dine betroede personer

overallPreparedness.description: Denne score afspejler, hvor klar hele din familie er til en nødsituation.
overallPreparedness.improvementNeeded: Din families forberedelse kan forbedres. Overvej at sende opdateringer til dem med lavere scores.
overallPreparedness.title: Samlet familiens forberedelse

familyHub.subtitle: Administrer adgangsniveauer og brug forberedelsesværktøjer for at sikre, at din familie er godt forberedt.
familyHub.title: Familie Hub

familyPreparednessTools.create_a_printable_guide_for_y_3: Create a printable guide for your family to follow in emergency situations.

errors.premiumRequired: This feature is only available for premium users. Please upgrade to access all tools.

death.disclaimer: This guide was generated based on the information you've provided. Please ensure all details are kept up to date.
death.title: Emergency Guide: In Case of My Death

hospitalization.title: Emergency Guide: If I Am Hospitalized

missing.contactCloseFriends: Contact close friends and regular contacts
missing.title: Emergency Guide: If I Go Missing

death.description: A comprehensive guide for handling immediate tasks after your passing
death.title: In case of my death

emergency.description: Quick reference for any urgent situation
emergency.title: General emergency

hospitalization.description: Steps to take if you are incapacitated or in medical care
hospitalization.title: If I am hospitalized

missing.description: Critical information and contacts if you cannot be located
missing.title: If I go missing

tools.emergencySimulatorDesc: Run a practice drill. We'll send a test scenario to your family to see if they can find the information they need.
tools.stepByStepGuidesDesc: Generate printable, scenario-based guides for your family (e.g., 'What to do in the first 24 hours').
tools.treasureHuntDesc: A gamified quiz for your family to ensure they know key facts, like where to find the will or who your lawyer is.
tools.videoMessagesDesc: Record personal video messages for your loved ones to be unlocked in specific circumstances.

familyPreparednessTools.use_these_tools_to_ensure_your_1: Use these tools to ensure your family is prepared and knows what to do in emergency situations.

form.description: Select a major life change to generate a personalized checklist
form.eventDescription: Choose the life event that best describes your current situation
form.title: Log Life Event
